name: ip-intelligence-correlator
description: Production-grade IP intelligence platform with multi-provider aggregation

scripts.build: npm --workspace=shared run build && npm --workspace=backend run build && npm --workspace=frontend run build
scripts.test: npm --workspace=backend run test && npm --workspace=frontend run test
scripts.test:unit: npm --workspace=backend run test:unit && npm --workspace=frontend run test:unit
scripts.lint: npm --workspace=backend run lint && npm --workspace=frontend run lint
scripts.type-check: npm --workspace=backend run type-check && npm --workspace=frontend run type-check
scripts.clean: npm --workspace=backend run clean && npm --workspace=frontend run clean && rm -rf node_modules
